frontCard: Wat is the tallest building in the United States?
fullAnswer: The One World Trade Center is the tallest builing in the United States.

frontCard: What is the largest body of water in North America?
fullAnswer: Lake Superior is the largest body of water in North America.

frontCard: What is the name of the highest point of elevation in the Unites States?
fullAnswer: Mt. McKinley is the highest point of elevation in the United States.

frontCard: What is the name of the richest company in the world?
fullAnswer: Walmart is the richest company in the world.

frontCard: What is the most expensive mass-produced car in the world, at $4.8 million?
fullAnswer: Koenigsegg CCXR Trevita is the most expensive mass-procduced car in the world, at $4.8 million.
